name: Cribbio
overview:
Cribbio is a website designed for open-minded individuals and professionals who want to track someone they have just met but didnâ€™t exchange contact details with.

Cribbio is a modern â€œmissed connectionsâ€ platform. It is an alternative to the location-based applications.

The website offers a simple and easily accessible system for searching not just by date and place, but also by place of departure. Who can tell when an encounter may occur: at parties or in the street, at networking and cultural events or while travelling.

Thereâ€™s no need to write a â€œmissed connectionsâ€ personal or browse through ads, so it saves time and effort. It also helps to keep the website tidy and easy to use.

Visitors can register on Cribbio using their Facebook or Twitter account details. Using a very simple internal messaging system, people who are looking for each other can then exchange messages and contact details.
